metadata.description:
LNRZ SZN 2 WK 3

Mija and DEEGAN. Fire and Ice. Two powerhouses of the web3 music scene are here for SZN 2, and we couldn't be more stoked

"Ghost" is a dark and catchy song that has been stuck in our heads ever since we first heard it.

Here is a (wild) quote from Deegan about the song:

"It feels like if Charlie XCX guest-starred on an episode of SpongeBob and performed a song in the bizzaro underworld location where everyone speaks with a tongue fart accent. The song even features claves which remind me of Gary the snail’s eyes smacking together. This is probably the 3rd song I’ve released singing in a British accent. I have tons more though."

Join LNRZ HQ here: https://guild.xyz/lnrz-hq
metadata.name: Mija x DEEGAN - Ghost #1
metadata.title: Mija x DEEGAN - Ghost
